title: 136 — 6 "Zenny of the Island of Goats and the Pirate Ship in the Mountains!"Transliteration: "Yagi no Shima no Zenii to Yama no Naka no Kaizoku Sen!" (Japanese:ヤギの島のゼニィと山の中の海賊船!) Directed by: Junichi FujiseStoryboarded by: Kenji Yokoyama Yoshiyuki Suga December 8, 2002(2002-12-08)[272] —
